title: Himi 494
lyrics:
M.Kh.
Ko Sihova-Nisi
[(Pea hiki ‘a ‘Isileli-’o nau
fokotu’u teniti ‘i Lefitimi
(Ko Malōlō’anga)-pea ha’u ai
‘a ‘Amaleki ‘o tau mo ‘Isileli
Pea lea ‘a Mosese,-Te u .’i he
mo’unga mo e tokotoko ‘o
‘Elohimi ‘i hoku nima. - Pea
ka hiki ‘e Mosese hono nima pea
mālohi ‘a ‘Isileli-Pea ne faka
hingoa ia ko Sihova-Nisi (Ko
‘eku Fuka ‘a Sihova) - Ekisoto 17]
1.
Tala ‘e he Folofola,
Nafa he kakai lelei,
Hili ‘a e mālōlō’anga
Tau’i mai ‘a ‘Amaleki
‘Oua, ‘oua te ke loto ua,
Foua, foua hala kuo tofa,
Hiki, hiki fuka ki ‘olunga
Ko Sihova Nisi hono lea.
2.
Tala ‘e he Folofola
Ke tau laka atu mu’a,
Tau malohi, loto to’a,
Hiki fuka ki ‘olunga.
‘Oua, ‘oua, etc.
3.
Ka ne tu’u mai ‘a e kotoa
Tau ‘a Heli mo māmani,
‘Eku fuka ‘a Sihova!
Ko e hā ha me’a ‘e fai?
‘Oua, ‘oua etc.
4.
‘A e Siasi, ke mou hiki
Tokotoko ki ‘olunga,
Pau ke vaivai ai ‘a e fili
‘I he mana ‘oe fuka.
‘Oua,’oua te ke loto ua,
Foua, foua hala kuo tofa,
Hiki, hiki fuka ki ‘olunga
Ko Sihova Nisi hono lea.*
